title: Happy Birthday, Ruby-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Should we really be doing this by ourselves....? Isn’t everyone else busy preparing for the joint event?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, that is that, and this is this, okay? Besides, everyone said that they’ll come here after they finish.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That’s right, let us celebrate your birthday, Ruby-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I-, it’s not like Ruby isn’t happy that you would celebrate mine! So umm.... Thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Don’t worry about it. It’s us that wanted to celebrate it, after all. Right, Chikacchi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Absolutely~. Here, go ahead and take this present from us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii!? S-, so heavy!? W-, what is this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That’s for you to see when you open it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Come on, try opening it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>O-, okay! Ehehe.... The birthday celebration now plus the joint event at the end of this week, there’s just so much happiness for me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
